hazard.description: GFDRR SWIO Madagascar TC-FL return period hazard footprints
hazard.value: Shows typical return period set of data for a key country and peril. Links to exposure data developed under the same project

hazard.description: GFDRR SWIO Madagascar EQ return period hazard footprints
hazard.value: Shows typical return period set of data for a key country and peril. Links to exposure data developed under the same project

hazard.description: Volcanic hazard (ashfall) footprint at Rungwe, Tanzania for three scenarios, each with 1000 realisations
hazard.value: Demo of the multiple events and footprint uncertainty capabilities

exposure.description: Tanzania roads data using GED4ALL taxonomy
exposure.value: Demo of network transport infrastructure data, coincides with TZ volcanic data
Building distribution, GEM taxonomy, open licence, includes nightime occupancy.
Exposure data developed under same project as two sample hazard data sets. Typical aggregate building data

loss.description: SWIO return period losses for Madagascar (EQ, TC, All perils)
loss.value: Demo of AAL losses and EP curve typical of a probabilistic risk assessment. Linking to sample EXP/HAZ data

vulnerability.description: TS fragility curves for residential buildings
vulnerability.value: Demo of F curves with parameter values relating intensity to probability of N damage states

vulnerability.value: Demo of V curves with parameter values, relating intensity to loss
